title: RBI Grade B - ESI - FLM5 - Descriptive

quiz.text:
Ques.1) Recent incidences in global politics highlights the trend towards de-globalization. Briefly explain the implication of de-globalization policies on India.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.1) What is ‘digital divide’? What are its implications? Also suggest measures to bridge the digital divide in India.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.2) Normally countries shift from agriculture to industry and then later to services, but India shifted directly from agriculture to services. What are the reasons for the huge growth of services vis-a-vis industry in the country? Can India become a developed country without a strong industrial base?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.2) What are the new climate targets pledged by India at COP 26? What is the rationale behind India’s announcement of new climate targets?
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.3) How and to what extent would micro-irrigation help in solving India’s water crisis?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.3) What is Budget Transparency? Scratching its genesis, discuss the benefits associated with budget transparency as well as the ways through which it can be promoted in functioning of a government?
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]
